story_parts.text: In a galaxy far, far away, there was a space cowboy who went on a heist adventure. He was looking for a treasure that was lost a long time ago. He had to team up with a group of outlaws to find it. They had to break into a heavily guarded space station to get it. In the end, they got the treasure and the space cowboy rode off into the sunset.

next_options.0: The space cowboy and his team are successful in getting the treasure and they all live happily ever after
next_options.1: The space cowboy and his team are captured by the authorities and sent to prison

story_parts.text: The space cowboy and his team are successful in getting the treasure and they all live happily ever after.

next_options.0: The space cowboy and his team take the treasure and use it to buy a new space ship
next_options.1: The space cowboy and his team take the treasure and use it to buy a new space ship and then they use it to buy a new space station

quiz_parts.question: What is the space cowboy's job?
